activities: PM Digital will, on behalf of its clients, receive personal information to process and fulfill orders.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
PM Digital is part of the following privacy programs:

1.  The DMA Safe Harbor Program.
2.  P3PSeal.
recoursemech: PM Digital has engaged the Direct Marketing Association to be its independ recourse mechanism for Safe Harbor matters.
